meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive A.C. Hawley Cori Wilhelm Damian Henri Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6680.

td.p: A.C. Hawley, a graduate student in media studies from Iowa City, Iowa
Cori Wilhelm, a college librarian from Parishville, New York
Damian Henri, an architect from Shaker Heights, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $63,600)

tr.td: OUTDOOR DRAMAS
CHICKEN DISHES
"WATER" WORKS
LIFE IS A SOAP OPERA
SCIENCE
BETWEEN JOBS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
